en.account_log_orgunit_created: Organization unit { orgunit } created within { company }.
en.account_log_orgunit_updated: Organization unit { property } changed from '{ fromValue }' to '{ toValue }'.
en.account_log_orgunit_removed: Organization unit { orgunit } removed from { company }.
en.account_log_role_added_to_orgunit: { account } added to organization unit { orgunit } within { company }.
en.account_log_role_removed_from_orgunit: { account } removed from organization unit { orgunit }.
en.account_log_application_added_to_orgunit: { application } added to organization unit { orgunit }.
en.account_log_application_removed_from_org: { application } removed from { orgunit } organization unit.
en.account_log_resource_added_to_group: Resource { resource } added to group {group} within { company }.
en.account_log_resource_removed_from_group: Resource { resource } removed from group {group} in { company }.
en.account_log_role_added_to_group: { account } added to group { group } within { company }.
en.account_log_role_removed_from_group: { account } removed from group { group } in { company }.
en.account_log_contact_added_to_group: { account } added to group { group } within { company }.
en.account_log_contact_removed_from_group: { account } removed from group { group } in { company }.
